exceptions.tactic: assert (H: Rabs (b - a) > 0) by apply Rlt_Rminus; lra.
exceptions.exn: In environment a, b : R eps : posreal Unable to unify "0 < ?M2364 - ?M2363" with "0 < Rabs (b - a)".

chat.content:
I will give you a Coq proof state, including both hypotheses and a specific goal and your need to prove it. Your response should be a singular code block of Coq proof starting with "```coq
", ending with "Qed.", without any additional explanation or commentary. Follow to these guidelines:
Introduce variables using unique names to avoid any conflicts.
Keep each command distinct and separated, avoid concatenations like ';' or '[cmd|cmd]'.
Organize your proof with bullets like '-', '+', and '*' instead of braces ({, }). Shift to their double symbols like '--' and '++', when necessary.
Effectively use given premises, follow the syntax and structure demonstrated in the examples provided.

Example 1:

Hypotheses:
n, m: nat
IHn: m + n = n + m

Goal:
m + S n = S n + m

Proof:
```coq
simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.
Qed.```

Example 2:
Hypotheses:

Goal:
forall n m : nat, m + n = n + m

```coq
intros n m. induction n.
- simpl. auto.
- simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.
Qed.```

Solve This Proof State:

Hypotheses:
b: R
a: R
eps: posreal

Goal:
{n : nat | seq_step (unif_part a b n) < eps}

Premises:
Inductive nat : Set := O : nat | S : nat -> nat For S: Argument scope is [nat_scope]
seq_step = fun s : seq R => foldr Rmax 0 (pairmap (fun x y : R => Rabs (y - x)) (head 0 s) (behead s)) : seq R -> R Argument scope is [seq_scope]
unif_part = fun (a b : R) (n : nat) => mkseq (fun i : nat => a + INR i * (b - a) / (INR n + 1)) (S (S n)) : R -> R -> nat -> seq R Argument scopes are [R_scope R_scope nat_scope]
unif_part_nat : forall (a b : R) (n : nat) (x : R), a <= x <= b -> {i : nat | nth 0 (unif_part a b n) i <= x < nth 0 (unif_part a b n) (S i) /\ (S (S i) < size (unif_part a b n))%nat} + {nth 0 (unif_part a b n) n <= x <= nth 0 (unif_part a b n) (S n)}
maxN : forall (a b : R) (del : posreal), a < b -> {n : nat | a + INR n * del < b <= a + INR (S n) * del}
seq_step_unif_part : forall (a b : R) (n : nat), seq_step (unif_part a b n) = Rabs ((b - a) / (INR n + 1))
head_unif_part : forall (x0 a b : R) (n : nat), head x0 (unif_part a b n) = a
last_unif_part : forall (x0 a b : R) (n : nat), last x0 (unif_part a b n) = b
unif_part_bound : forall (a b : R) (n : nat), unif_part a b n = rev (unif_part b a n)
unif_part_sort : forall (a b : R) (n : nat), a <= b -> sorted Rle (unif_part a b n)
max_N : forall a b : R, posreal -> a < b -> nat
Nzorn : forall I : nat -> Prop, (exists n : nat, I n) -> Nbound I -> {n : nat | I n /\ (forall i : nat, I i -> (i <= n)%nat)}
phi_sequence_prop : forall (un : nat -> posreal) (f : R -> R) (a b : R) (pr : Riemann_integrable f a b) (N : nat), {psi : StepFun a b | (forall t : R, Rmin a b <= t <= Rmax a b -> Rabs (f t - phi_sequence un pr N t) <= psi t) /\ Rabs (RiemannInt_SF psi) < un N}
phi_sequence : (nat -> posreal) -> forall (f : R -> R) (a b : R), Riemann_integrable f a b -> nat -> StepFun a b
Rlt_Rminus : forall a b : R, a < b -> 0 < b - a
Heine_cor1 : forall (f : R -> R) (a b : R), a < b -> (forall x : R, a <= x <= b -> continuity_pt f x) -> forall eps : posreal, {delta : posreal | delta <= b - a /\ (forall x y : R, a <= x <= b -> a <= y <= b -> Rabs (x - y) < delta -> Rabs (f x - f y) < eps)}
Riemann_integrable = fun (f : R -> R) (a b : R) => forall eps : posreal, {phi : StepFun a b & {psi : StepFun a b | (forall t : R, Rmin a b <= t <= Rmax a b -> Rabs (f t - phi t) <= psi t) /\ Rabs (RiemannInt_SF psi) < eps}} : (R -> R) -> R -> R -> Type Argument scopes are [function_scope R_scope R_scope]
fe : forall a b : R, StepFun a b -> R -> R
Heine_cor2 : forall (f : R -> R) (a b : R), (forall x : R, a <= x <= b -> continuity_pt f x) -> forall eps : posreal, {delta : posreal | forall x y : R, a <= x <= b -> a <= y <= b -> Rabs (x - y) < delta -> Rabs (f x - f y) < eps}
RiemannInt_SF : forall a b : R, StepFun a b -> R
Rminus_le_0 : forall a b : R, a <= b < -> 0 <= b - a
compact_P3 : forall a b : R, compact (fun c : R => a <= c <= b)
BinNatDef.N.to_nat = fun a : N => match a with | 0%N => 0%nat | N.pos p => Pos.to_nat p end : N -> nat Argument scope is [N_scope]
ssrnat.leq = fun m n : nat => eqtype.eq_op (ssrnat.subn m n) 0%nat : nat -> nat -> bool Argument scopes are [nat_scope nat_scope]
SF_cut_up_step : forall (s : SF_seq) (x eps : R), SF_h s <= x <= last (SF_h s) (SF_lx s) -> seq_step (SF_lx s) < eps -> seq_step (SF_lx (SF_cut_up s x)) < eps
SF_cut_down_step : forall (s : SF_seq) (x eps : R), SF_h s <= x <= last (SF_h s) (SF_lx s) -> seq_step (SF_lx s) < eps -> seq_step (SF_lx (SF_cut_down s x)) < eps
size_mkseq : forall (T : Type) (f : nat -> T) (n : nat), size (mkseq f n) = n
seq_step_rev : forall l : seq R, seq_step (rev l) = seq_step l
Inductive nat : Set := O : nat | S : nat -> nat For S: Argument scope is [nat_scope]
is_true = fun b : bool => b = true : bool -> Prop Argument scope is [bool_scope] is_true is a coercion
Init.Nat.pred = fun n : nat => match n with | 0%nat => n | S u => u end : nat -> nat Argument scope is [nat_scope]
Init.Nat.sub = fix sub (n m : nat) {struct n} : nat := match n with | 0%nat => n | S k => match m with | 0%nat => n | S l => sub k l end end : nat -> nat -> nat Argument scopes are [nat_scope nat_scope]
Record StepFun (a b : R) : Type := mkStepFun { fe : R -> R; pre : IsStepFun fe a b } For mkStepFun: Arguments a, b, fe are implicit For StepFun: Argument scopes are [R_scope R_scope] For mkStepFun: Argument scopes are [R_scope R_scope function_scope _]
INR = fix INR (n : nat) : R := match n with | 0%nat => 0 | 1%nat => 1 | S (S _ as n0) => INR n0 + 1 end : nat -> R Argument scope is [nat_scope]
pow = fix pow (r : R) (n : nat) {struct n} : R := match n with | 0%nat => 1 | S n0 => r * pow r n0 end : R -> nat -> R Argument scopes are [R_scope nat_scope]
nth_mkseq : forall (T : Type) (x0 : T) (f : nat -> T) (n i : nat), ssrnat.leq (S i) n -> nth x0 (mkseq f n) i = f i
seq.iota = fix iota (m n : nat) {struct n} : seq nat := match n with | 0%nat => [::] | S n' => m :: iota (S m) n' end : nat -> nat -> seq nat Argument scopes are [nat_scope nat_scope]
seq_step_ge_0 : forall x : seq R, 0 <= seq_step x
nth_le_seq_step : forall (x0 : R) (l : seq R) (i : nat), (S i < size l)%nat -> Rabs (nth x0 l (S i) - nth x0 l i) <= seq_step l
BinIntDef.Z.of_nat = fun n : nat => match n with | 0%nat => 0%Z | S n0 => Z.pos (Pos.of_succ_nat n0) end : nat -> Z Argument scope is [nat_scope]
BinIntDef.Z.quotrem = fun a b : Z => match a with | 0%Z => (0%Z, 0%Z) | Z.pos a0 => match b with | 0%Z => (0%Z, a) | Z.pos b0 => let (q, r) := N.pos_div_eucl a0 (N.pos b0) in (BinIntDef.Z.of_N q, BinIntDef.Z.of_N r) | Z.neg b0 => let (q, r) := N.pos_div_eucl a0 (N.pos b0) in ((- BinIntDef.Z.of_N q)%Z, BinIntDef.Z.of_N r) end | Z.neg a0 => match b with | 0%Z => (0%Z, a) | Z.pos b0 => let (q, r) := N.pos_div_eucl a0 (N.pos b0) in ((- BinIntDef.Z.of_N q)%Z, (- BinIntDef.Z.of_N r)%Z) | Z.neg b0 => let (q, r) := N.pos_div_eucl a...
seq_step_cat : forall x y : seq R, (0 < size x)%nat -> (0 < size y)%nat -> last 0 x = head 0 y -> seq_step (x ++ behead y) = Rmax (seq_step x) (seq_step y)
foldr_rcons : forall (f : ?T0 -> ?T -> ?T) (x0 : ?T) (s : seq ?T0) (t : ?T0), foldr f x0 (rcons s t) = foldr f (f t x0) s where ?T : [a : R b : R eps : posreal |- Type] ?T0 : [a : R b : R eps : posreal |- Type]

```coq
assert (H: Rabs (b - a) > 0) by apply Rlt_Rminus; lra.
assert (H0: (Rabs (b - a) / eps)%R > 0) by (apply Rdiv_lt_0_compat; lra).
assert (H1: exists n : nat, INR n > (Rabs (b - a) / eps)) by apply archimed.
destruct H1 as [N H1].
exists (max_N 0 N eps H0).
unfold seq_step, unif_part.
rewrite seq_step_unif_part.
apply Rle_lt_trans with (Rabs ((b - a) / (INR (max_N 0 N eps H0) + 1))).
apply Rabs_pos.
apply H1.
Qed.```

original: assert (H: Rabs (b - a) > 0) by apply Rlt_Rminus; lra. assert (H0: (Rabs (b - a) / eps)%R > 0) by (apply Rdiv_lt_0_compat; lra). assert (H1: exists n : nat, INR n > (Rabs (b - a) / eps)) by apply archimed. destruct H1 as [N H1]. exists (max_N 0 N eps H0). unfold seq_step, unif_part. rewrite seq_step_unif_part. apply Rle_lt_trans with (Rabs ((b - a) / (INR (max_N 0 N eps H0) + 1))). apply Rabs_pos. apply H1.
